materials.raw_text:
Bismuth (Bi): 80 g 
 Cerium (Ce): 80 g 
 Terbium (Tb): 120 g 
 Technetium (Tc): 40 g

sourcing.instructions:
Bismuth: Purchase from a chemical supplier or online marketplace. 
 Cerium: Obtain from rare earth metal suppliers. 
 Terbium: Available from specialty metal suppliers or online vendors. 
 Technetium: Source from a licensed radioactive material supplier.
